text: oh, yeah, sorry, stable `BinaryBuilder` doesn't work at all on v1.6+.  I meant to say that we don't need extra changes on `BB#master` to make it work with Julia v1.6, the bulk of the needed changes was in the PR to BBB which has been merged yesterday or two days ago
